benchmark_details.name: ELSA (Emotion and Language Style Alignment Dataset)
benchmark_details.overview: The ELSA dataset bridges the gap between emotional granularity and stylistic diversity necessary for effective emotion-conditioned text generation systems.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To support deeper explorations into emotion-conditioned style-adaptive text generation and improve emotion modeling in NLP.

data.source: Derived from the dair-ai/emotion dataset, enriched with fine-grained emotions from GoEmotions.
data.annotation: LLM-generated emotional variations of original sentences across various stylistic contexts.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated using established NLP measures for fluency and emotional variance.
methodology.interpretation: Metrics reflect emotional authenticity, linguistic fluency, and textual diversity.
methodology.validation: Rigorous evaluation using computational metrics and LLM-based augmentation techniques.
